Text: FW Palo Alto Services AgreementNonPrivilegedpst gerald I am leaving for the airport at and will be looking at this on the plane When you have a chanc to look at it you can give me a call on my cell phone I would really like your input thanks Kim Original Message From Dickson Stacy E Sent Tuesday June PM To Ward Kim S Subject Palo Alto Services Agreement Attached is a clean and redlined version of the latest draft of the abovereferenced agreement Stacy

FW Natural Gas Services AgreementNonPrivilegedpst dated wednesday june Original Message From Dickson Stacy E Sent Wednesday June AM To Ward Kim S Subject Natural Gas Services Agreement Attached is the final draft of the abovereferenced agreement I do have some comments to the Transaction Agreement that I will forward shortly I cannot give the final goahead on the TA until I have had a chance to talk to Kim Stacy

FW Transaction AgreementNonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Dickson Stacy E Sent Wednesday June PM To Ward Kim S Subject Transaction Agreement Attached is a draft of the TA which includes my comments I have attached only a clean version because my comparison software is not working correctly Sorry for the inconvenience Stacy

FW Palo Alto NGSA and Transaction AgreementsNonPrivilegedpst Palo Altos comments dated june th Original Message From Barry McCarthy ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBarryMcCarthyCbmccmccarthylawEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday June PM To Dickson Stacy E Cc Ward Kim S Padilla Monica Dailey Karla Subject Palo Alto NGSA and Transaction Agreements Stacy I have attached the one page Exhibit B Customers Load that I received from Monica Padilla this morning for incorporation into the NGSA Please let me know if you have any problems opening this document The NSGA appears to be just about ready I have no further comments on the draft you sent by email this morning You might want to check the spacing and alignment of the Article paragraphs on page and eliminate the underlining for a and b of Article on page We have provided ENA with the City Council authorizing resolution and I assume you will providing a Certificate of Incumbency or similar evidence of authority for ENA similar to that provided for the Enfolio Agreement unless you propose some alternative The Transaction Agreement also appears to be in order with the following minor editorial changes the address should be changed to City of Palo Alto PO Box Palo Alto CA Utilities Departmentrd Floor Attn Monica Padilla Resource Planner delete the period at the end of the first paragraph after the word deliver change the date on page from June to July add a period at the end of the Termination paragraph capitalize the word BaseLoad in the paragraph entitled Fixed Pricing and provide a little more space for the signature lines Once these changes are made please email a final version to me and Monica Padilla I really appreciate your efforts and kind cooperation in getting these documents finalized Please call if you have any questions Barry F McCarthy EnronExhibitBdoc

FW Palo Alto ContractsNonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Barry McCarthy ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBarryMcCarthyCbmccmccarthylawEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday June PM To Dickson Stacy E Cc Ward Kim S Padilla Monica Dailey Karla Balachandran Girish Subject Palo Alto Contracts Stacy I hope all is well on the home front The more astute among us have spotted the following items in the agreements that should be changed NGSA Section ii change counterparty contract to counterparty contact Section change or should have know to or should have known Section There was also some discussion about the prohibition against issuing any statement with respect to the existence of this Agreement being overly broad Because Palo Alto is a public agency open meeting laws may result in referencing this agreement although not necessarily disclosing the business terms I think this concern would be addressed by adding the language I proposed in the email I sent you yesterday Transaction Agmt The end date of the Delivery Period described on page two should be December rather than June to coincide with the term of the NGSA It would help matters immensely if we could get a final version of both agreements from you by noon Houston time on Monday If there are any problems please let me know right away Thanks Barry F McCarthy

FW IMPORTANT NOTICE Change of GIMBOriginal Message From Reid Mary TPMAD ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESReidCMaryTPMADCMReidsocalgasEcomE NRONcom Sent Monday June PM To Angela Olaveson Angie Sergesketter Beverly HolmesDynegy Bill KnoxState of Cal Cathy Hawes Cheryl MorganDorsey Cynthia RodriguezSempra Energy Solutions Dave EllisDynegy Deanna SharpeExelon Gordon PickeringIDACORP Greg BassSempra Energy Solutions Jane ShoppleinSCANA Janis MoisantBranca Jay CattermolePancanadian Joanna PenuelaPancanadian Joe Alves BP Energy John HoganSouthern Comany Judi VogelEPME Kay Cantrell Ward Kim S Kirbey BosleyReliant Energy Kris ShiremanEnron Melanie Magrini Mike BucherOccidental Parks WessonAstra Power Peter MeleraSET Robert TurnerEl Paso Mercant Energy Roberta CrowleyCoral Energy Roger PonceEnron Energy Services Ruby RobinsonEnron Steve SnyderHESCO Tina KavanaughTXU Tom RothPGE Energy Trading Veronica Jones DESC Wayne EllisWilliams Energy Wendy CallahanMirant Energy Subject IMPORTANT NOTICE Change of GIMB The attached was posted on GasSelect Please make sure you read so that you become familiar with the new standby procurement penalty rules for the GIMB tariff In a nut shell Penalty is now calculated at of highest daily border price index at the SoCal border The charge should begin from the first day of the flow month and end five days prior to the start of each corresponding imbalance trading period The charge will be posted at least one day in advance of each corresponding imbalance trading period Since this became effective on June SoCalGas will determine the highest daily border price during the period of June through July and post it no later than July Customers are assessed this penalty for any underdeliveries outside the tolerance for trades that take place from July for June imbalances Please call me if you have questions regarding this new GIMB calculation Thanks Mary ph fx RGPDF GIMBSPDF RGPDF GIMBSPDF

RE price indicationsI have added Socal to the worksheet The prices listed are as of last night Nymex is up Basis is pretty much the same Let me know if you need anything else and I will let you guys know as soon as I get the option information thanks Kim Original Message From Silva Lawrence ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESSilvaCLawrenceCLSilvaciEglendaleEcaEusE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June AM To Ward Kim S Subject RE price indications Kim Do you have any price indicators for CA Border Topock gas Thanks Larry Original Message From Ward Kim S mailtoKim NRONcom Sent Monday June PM To Jack Dolan Email Subject price indications Hi guys I have been working on some pricing information for you guys and have attached the fixed prices after todays close for Nymex Aeco San Juan and Permian as we discussed The guys on our structuring desk are pricing up calls and puts for the same delivery points for August thru March and August thru July The Nymex was crushed today about down for the year strip The balance of was down almost The balance of is up about on access The socal basis fell significantly today as well Let me know if there is anything else you need Jack I will send you the storage info I have asap Had trouble accessing it today for some reason I will send the option pricing as soon as I get it Thanks Kim price indications june xls

storage graphsJack Attached is a graph showing storage year by year We are expecting another rather large injection this week Cal Nymex is up about but the balance of is down about a penny There is no weather to speak of and therefore no demand for physical gas this is what is driving prices down Let me know if you have any questions Am still working on the option pricing Thanks Kim

RE City of Palo Alto Natural Gas RFPMonica Attached are the price indications that you asked for Let me know if you want to do anything or if you have any questions Thanks Kim Original Message From Padilla Monica ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESPadillaCMonicaCMonicaFPadillacityEpaloaltoEcaEusE NRONcom Sent Monday April AM To Ward Kim S Subject RE City of Palo Alto Natural Gas RFP I am assuming youre looking at the daily tab The first column reflects actual usage The second column is a day rolling average Could I get price indications from you today for a customer of ours Their load is pretty small MMBtuday I need monthly prices at Malin and Citygate starting July through June Thanks Monica Original Message From mailto Sent Monday April AM To Subject RE City of Palo Alto Natural Gas RFP Monica What is the difference in the volumes in the first column and those in the second column I am working on this today and must discuss with the desk who will be managing the extra risk I hope to have something back to you by tomarrow Thanks Kim Original Message From Padilla Monica ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESPadillaCMonicaCMonicaFPadillacityE paloaltoEcaEusE NRONcom Sent Thursday April PM To CENERGYCOM Ward Kim S Subject City of Palo Alto Natural Gas RFP Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to interview you as our potential natural gas supplier We will make our selection by May and would like to give you one final opportunity to send us your final proposal As was discussed in the interview it is the Citys desire to avoid daily price risk and EFOOFO penalties We understand that the changing market warrants the end user to take on more of that risk or to pay for it in the form of premiums however we also realize that our load is relatively constant and driven mainly by weather I have attached over three years of daily historical usage for the City Please consider this information when submitting your final proposal Please email me your final proposal by May Regards Monica V Padilla daily usage valuesxls daily usage valuesxls File daily usage valuesxls
RE City of Corona CAKnauf keeps teasing me

Tony I am still working on a term sheet for you I was hoping to get you something today but got pulled away Also I still need to talk to our transportation expert regarding your situation Hopefully I will have something tomarrow I will be in touch Thanks Kim Ward

FW Gas storage facilityOriginal Message From Foster Chris H Sent Thursday May PM To Ward Kim S Cc Mentan Ronald Subject FW Gas storage facility Kim Is Stephanie Miller the right person for this Can you forward this to the correct person C Original Message From Mentan Ronald Sent Thursday May AM To Foster Chris H Subject Gas storage facility Chris The owner of an underground gas storage facility called me today asking to contact a person in Enron regarding the possibility of leasing his storage It is a depleted gas reservoir in Antioch near the Sacramento River It is connected to the Calpine system but it is not connected to the PGE system Its capacity is six bcf and currently contains one bcf It is surrounded by several hundred available acres if you wanted to consider building a power plant If anyone in ENA might be interested in talking to this guy could you please refer them to Ken Beebe whose phone is Thanks

GTC for Cal physical sale San Juan Cc Art Attached is the contract that would govern this transaction Barry and I have discussed San Juan risks but we are willing to take it however the actual offer at this time is for to delivered at the Blanco Pool When you are ready to transact I will update the exact price at that time Let me know what you want to do Thanks Kim

RE City of Long BeachUnless it has changed I sent him one on March Anyway his email address is Let me know if you need anything else thanks Kim Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Wednesday May PM To Williams Jason R Ward Kim S Diamond Russell Hyvl Dan Subject City of Long Beach Kim attached is a draft for the City of Long Beach Do you have an email add for Mr Garner File City of Long Beachdoc Debra Perlingiere Enron North America Corp Legal Department Smith Street EB Houston Texas Phone Fax

RE FW open houseHouston has actually been nice hasnt gone above and it is great to sit outside at night Anyway you work too much and need to think about getting a life We had the best intentions of going to Greasewood flats but were too lazy to drive there It was an awesome relaxing weekend and the weather was great We hiked camelback on Saturday I will be coming back to PHX to visit Arizona Public Service soon dont know exactly when yet Let me know when you feel the need to get away to some nice humid weather its good for the complexion you know Take care Kim Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESSmcelmoaolEcom NRONcom Sent Thursday May AM To Ward Kim S Subject Re FW open house It was degrees here yesterdaybut a dry heat I wonder how that compares to Houston Humidity This Friday May I have four new brokers coming over from the competition so Im afraid my weekend will be spent at the office working with them Honestly Id rather be sweating in Houston and be at your party Did you make it to Greasewood Flats

FW Enron TransactionJeff Attached is the latest Palo Alto document with their red lined comments I havent had a chance to look at them yet but will right now Thanks Kim Original Message From Padilla Monica ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESPadillaCMonicaCMonicaFPadillacityEpaloaltoEcaEusE NRONcom Sent Thursday June PM To Ward Kim S Subject FW Enron Transaction Kim Here are our changes to the NGSA Are we on for this afternoon at pm our time Ill call you to confirm Monica Original Message From Barry McCarthy mailto Sent Thursday June AM To Dailey Karla Padilla Monica Subject Enron Transaction Monica and Karla The attached draft Natural Gas Services Agreement contains the remainder of my suggested revisions to the document beginning with Article where I stopped renumbering There are no additional changes to the redlined portion of the draft Articles thru I sent yesterday Let me know as soon as you find out about the time scheduled for the conference call with Enron Thanks Barry F McCarthy NGSABFMdoc

PM on PM To cc Subject Fwd FW this is good This is GOODI expect it back too A simple friend has never seen you cry A real friend has shoulders soggy from your tears A simple friend doesnt know your parents first names A real friend has their phone numbers in his address book A simple friend brings a bottle of wine to your party A real friend comes early to help you cook and stays late to help you clean A simple friend hates it when you call after he has gone to bed A real friend asks you why you took so long to call A simple friend seeks to talk with you about your problems A real friend seeks to help you with your problems A simple friend wonders about your romantic history A real friend could blackmail you with it A simple friend when visiting acts like a guest A real friend opens your refrigerator and helps himself A simple friend thinks the friendship is over when you HAVE an argument A real friend knows that its not a friendship until after youve had a fight A simple friend expects you to always be there for them A real friend expects to always be there for you Pass this on to anyone you care aboutif you get it back you have A ball is a circle No beginning no end It keeps us together like our Circle of Friends But the treasure inside for you to see is the treasure of friendship youve granted to me Today I pass the friendship ball to you Pass it on to someone who is a friend to you INSTANTLY WHEN YOU RECEIVE THIS LETTER YOURE REQUESTED TO SEND IT TO AT LEAST PEOPLE INCLUDING THE PERSON WHO SENT IT TO YOU ReturnPath Received from rlyzamxaolcom rlyzamailaolcom FW price indicationsOriginal Message From Ward Kim S Sent Monday June PM To Jack Dolan Email Subject price indications Hi guys I have been working on some pricing information for you guys and have attached the fixed prices after todays close for Nymex Aeco San Juan and Permian as we discussed The guys on our structuring desk are pricing up calls and puts for the same delivery points for August thru March and August thru July The Nymex was crushed today about down for the year strip The balance of was down almost The balance of is up about on access The socal basis fell significantly today as well Let me know if there is anything else you need Jack I will send you the storage info I have asap Had trouble accessing it today for some reason I will send the option pricing as soon as I get it Thanks Kim

swap pictureHi guys Attached is the swap picture we discussed I am working on some call prices as well and will send them asap Prices fell significantly today probobly going one year out at the PGE City gate Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Kim
